title: Challenges Of Being In Love With An Emotionally Broken Man | Times Now
text: Challenges Of Being In Love With An Emotionally Broken Man Are you in love with an emotionally broken man? Well, then you will resonate with certain challenges associated with it. Read on to know more about them. (Picture Credit: Freepik) If you're in love with an emotionally broken man, then you will realise that there are some common challenges associated with it. An emotionally broken man may learn to love again, trust again, but may find it difficult to express himself. Since we all know how major role communication plays in an intimate relationship, when a man finds it hard to express himself and contribute his 100% to the relationship, it invariably takes a toll on the health of the relationship. Listed below are some of the common challenges associated with being in love with an emotionally broken man. He doesnâ€™t confide in you When an emotionally broken man falls in love with a girl they may have trouble confiding in her. From not sharing their day-to-day happenings with their partner to not being able to talk about their heartfelt feelings and vulnerabilities, emotionally broken men have been hurt before and they fear getting hurt again. To evade that, they may act in a distant and aloof manner with their partner. Also read: [6 Types Of Men That Women Can't Resist](https://www.timesnownews.com/lifestyle/relationships/love-sex/6-types-of-men-that-women-cant-resist-article-110248774) He maybe ruthless at times It's not like an emotionally broken man is incapable of loving someone. However, they may be incapable of expressing it. So, if you are in love with an emotionally broken man, then you may resonate with this that he can be extremely cold and ruthless at times. Even when they realise that you want them to communicate or you want them to be more involved in the relationship, they may not be able to give in even their 20%. They may dismiss your feelings and may not pay any attention to your needs at times. He may act as if he doesn't care It is often noticed that emotionally broken men develop a strong defence mechanism over a period of time. So, in situations when you have a fight or when you are not in talking terms with each other, it is possible that he will make you feel that he is completely capable of detaching himself from you. This can make it particularly difficult for their partners to deal with them and understand them. Also read: [Things You Should Never Do In The Bedroom](https://www.timesnownews.com/lifestyle/relationships/love-sex/things-you-should-never-do-in-the-bedroom-article-110175458) He may never let his guard down In every relationship it is very important for two people to feel a heightened sense of belonging with each other. It only happens when two people develop a strong emotional intimacy with each other. However, with emotionally broken men, it can be sometimes difficult to establish strong emotional intimacy, because the may never let their guard down and talk about their vulnerabilities, their innermost feelings, what their past experiences have been and how they feel about things. He may act in a very rigid manner Emotionally broken men can be very rigid at times. Especially, when their partner tries to reason with them to change their ways, they may become very defensive. It happens because in their head they are doing the right thing and thinking in the right direction.
